constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 192 (Tuesday, November 2, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ROGERS of Alabama:
H.R. 5826
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H6126]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.

title: To allow States to elect to observe year-round daylight saving time, and for other purposes.
